original_text: The Son of Man came eating and drinking, and they say, ‘Here is a glutton and a drunkard, a friend of tax collectors and sinners.’ But wisdom is proved right by her deeds.”
korean_text: 인자는 와서 먹고 마시매 말하기를 보라 먹기를 탐하고 포도주를 즐기는 사람이요 세리와 죄인의 친구로다 하니 지혜는 그 행한 일로 인하여 옳다 함을 얻느니라

sentences.original_text: The Son of Man came eating and drinking
Here is a glutton and a drunkard
a friend of tax collectors and sinners
But wisdom is proved right by her deeds
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 지혜는 그 행위로 의롭다 함을 얻느니라
